p: A recent study exploring in-vitro activity of remdesivir and chloroquine has demonstrated efficacy of the drugs in inhibiting replication of SARS-COV2. A recent case report described the use of remdesivir, requested for compassionate use, in the first patients with COVID-19 in the United States. Two ongoing clinical randomized clinical trials in China are evaluating remdesivir for moderate and sever COVID-19 infections.
